data.name: FlightChess
data.detailed_description:
When it comes to flying chess, do you remember the fun times you had with your friends on the board? Now you can play online with your friends in the classic and soon the new prop mode!

Flying Chess includes both classic and prop modes, and supports both single player AI and LAN multiplayer modes. The game has four different colored aircraft camps for players to choose from, easy to understand rules, simple and fast operation, and the exact same gameplay as you remember from your childhood, making it a great choice for many casual players!

The early full version of the game is now available. Online play and prop mode will be released soon, so stay tuned!

data.short_description: 《FlightChess》is a game base on tradition game mode ludo to made,the name is it be called at China.Our game include classic mode and prop mode.You can play it with friends at host.And we will upload the online room soon.We hope you can play our game at weekend with your friends, enjoy the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD620
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win11
  • Processor: AMD 1600x
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon rx550
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
